name: Heavy - The First Form
description:
A port of the original game from 2009.

In a parallel world, you play as Nina Alexx - an eccentric mercenary and an ex-treasure hunter who is on an extraction mission that goes horribly wrong. The game includes 2D platforming stages as well as 3D driving stages and it will not hold your hand. Some of the stages requires completing a certain task to progress. Collecting stars and purchasing upgrades with them is essential for surviving. Due to the retro nature of the game, make sure to check out the 'Help' menu before jumping into action.
